title: Adult
overview: Fourteen-year-old Antonio was living with his father when suddenly one day his father didn't come home and didn't respond to his messages or phone calls. Antonio learns from a neighbor that his father has been hospitalized due to a motorcycle accident, and since then he has had to cope with life on his own; in addition to studying for schoolwork and feeding himself, he also has to spend money on fixing his car....... It is not easy to get through to the day when his father is released from the hospital, and Antonio discovers that his father has gone to the police station, and it turns out that the car accident has another hidden agenda...
